title: More peaches - #1 Peach Sorbet
abstract:
At the start of the year, Pauline was overwhelmed with an abundance of peaches and sent in so many recipes that they wouldn’t all fit in the Cooks Column.
Cunningly, I filed the left-over recipes in a file called ‘Future editions’ on the Waranga News computer - in case of an emergency.
The emergency has arisen: The one who was to write this edition’s column, carefully typed up her recipe on her home computer and then headed off to Canberra. She forgot to push the ‘send’ button, didn’t she? 
No need to panic . . we can use Pauline’s peach recipes.
method: Chop peaches into chunks skin on, freeze.
In your blender, nutri bullet or thermo, add all ingredients and blitz.
Pour into takeaway trays, freeze until desired ‘frozeness’.
I found the honey was too strong in flavour for the peaches.
